sumarize_req: Cơm Tấm Cali (CTC) is a restaurant chain specializing in authentic Vietnamese cuisine, with a focus on the popular dish Cơm Tấm, made from broken rice. CTC currently has over 10 branches. Beyond its multiple branches, CTC offers a convenient online ordering system and various payment options to cater to a wide range of customers. Customers are easily able to choose and place food orders on the website which automatically transfers the customer request to the nearest branch. The website allows customers to pay the bill online. The restaurant frequently runs promotions to enhance customer value, and customers should be provided the way to keep track and apply them, and actively seeks customer feedback to continuously improve its offerings and services, ensuring a satisfying dining experience rooted in Vietnamese culinary tradition.
